description:
Nagi Springfield is the main protagonist`s father, famous by the name of The Thousand Master, the strongest mage, the hero who saved the magic world. When one man tried to describe the Ala Rubra (basically, Nagi and his companions), he went through the weaknesses of all its members, and finally added, "Tidbit no.4. The redhaired mage has no weaknesses. He`s invincible."
Nagi went missing 10 years ago, last seen in the Middle East. Though considered dead by many, he suddenly appeared to save Negi when his village was overrun by demons.
name: Nagi Springfield
